```{r}
mat = matrix(c(1,2,4,5,2,3), nrow = 2, ncol = 3 )

twotwo <- mat[, 1:2]

newMat <- cbind(twotwo, c(13, 14))
print(newMat)

print(newMat[, -c(1, 2)])

```

```{r}
today()

ymd("2023-02-22")
ymd("2017-01-31")
```

```{r}
datetime <- ymd_hms("2016-07-08 12:34:56")

year(datetime)
#> [1] 2016
month(datetime)
#> [1] 7
mday(datetime)
#> [1] 8

yday(datetime)
#> [1] 190
wday(datetime)
#> [1] 6
```
```{r}
mat1 <- matrix(c(1,2,3,4,3,4), nrow =2, ncol =3)
mat1v1 <- mat1[, 2:3]
mat1v1

mat2 <- matrix(c(7, 8), nrow = 1, ncol = 2)

mat3 <- rbind(mat1v1, mat2)

print(mat3)

mat1[, -c(1, 2)]

ara <- array(c(1,2,3,4,2,1), dim = c(2,2,3))


seq(5,15)


thirdElement <- list("apple", "banana", c("cherry", "grape"))
thirdElement[[3]][[2]]


sortval <- c("apple", "orange", "banana", "grape")
sort(sortval)
```
